interestingcomments.content:
X-T10 capacitor repair /!/ My trusty X-T10 was dropped onto a stone surface. Luckily it landed on an L-bracket I've mounted, so no external damage.

Unfortunately it does seem to have affected the internals. Upon turning off the camera, all settings are lost. Even with a fully charged (original) battery inserted. I also seem to be unable to set the date - I can choose date and time, but it immediately reverts to January 1st 2000. Even if I don't turn it off. Google tells me that the capacitor is busted or disconnected.

My question is: How screwed am I in terms of repair cost? 

The body is out of warranty... And I live in Denmark which, if you know about the place, can be a challenge when you need repairs or parts at a reasonable price.

Or maybe I'm lucky enough that someone knows a diy solution to the issue?
